0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE TO EXERCISE ITS OVERSIGHT FUNCTIONS AND INVESTIGATE IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE P120-MILLION SMUGGLED RICE SEIZED BY THE PHILIPPINE COAST GUARD (PCG) IN A CARGO SHIP OFF IN ZAMBOANGA SIBUGAY WITH THE END VIEW OF DESIGNING MEASURES DETERRING SUCH ILLEGAL ACTIVITIES
